name: Alternato
description:
Good cannot exist without evil.

Alternato is a simple but addictive game where you'll first play as a demon attacking an angel, and then as the angel avoiding the demon, repeating an infinite loop where one cannot exist without the other.

This game was made as part of the Global Game Jam 2022, following the theme of "Duality".

DEVELOPERS:

Kaleth Cristancho - Programmer

Carlos "Charlie" David Gómez Rosas - Artist
